summary: Hides the full-face helmets that guards wear!
descriptionHtml:
Yes! Guards\' heads do indeed come off the guards\' bodies if you execute a decapitation kill!

This mod hides the full-face helmet that city guards and most Stormcloak soldiers wear. I was getting tired of how faceless and non-human the guards seem to be.

This mod only hides the helmets, does not completely remove them, so they still have the armor bonuses for wearing the now invisible helmet.  The world model is visible so you can see the helmet model in your inventory or if it\'s an object sitting somewhere in the world, but once you or a guard puts the helmet on, *poof* it disappears! 

Also on the Steam Workshop
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=8658
author: Erazai
